meanings.definition: Wide in extent from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The road was so broad that two cars could easily drive side by side.
meanings.sent2: The river was so broad that it took a long time to swim across.
meanings.sent3: The broad smile on the clown's face made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her broad knowledge of history amazed her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The broad mountain range stretched as far as the eye could see.

meanings.definition: Covering a large number and wide scope of subjects or areas.
meanings.sent1: The newspaper had a broad range of articles covering various topics.
meanings.sent2: Her broad experience in different fields made her a valuable team member.
meanings.sent3: The broad selection of ice cream flavors made it hard to choose just one.
meanings.sent4: His broad understanding of science helped him excel in school.
meanings.sent5: The library offered a broad collection of books for all ages.

meanings.sent1: She gave a broad overview of the project without going into specifics.
meanings.sent2: The broad strokes of the painting left room for interpretation.
meanings.sent3: His broad explanation confused the students more than it helped.
meanings.sent4: The broad description of the event left out important details.
meanings.sent5: The broad summary of the book didn't capture its depth and complexity.

meanings.definition: Having a wide range or extent.
meanings.sent1: The store had a broad selection of shoes in different styles.
meanings.sent2: Her interests were broad, ranging from art to sports.
meanings.sent3: The broad variety of fruits at the market made shopping enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge was broad, covering many different fields.
meanings.sent5: The company offered a broad range of products to meet customer needs.
